column4: hello can anyone tell me the shortcut to scroll through windows
please someone i forgot and pc is in hang state
alt-tab?  not sure exactly what you're looking for.
ahhhh.  ctrl-alt-f(x), where x is 1-7.  usually, terms are on 1-5, and x runs in 6 or 7 (can't remember).  so, ctrl-alt-f7 will get you there
